DOC.brief_title: Study Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) Not Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age 20 year time inform consent Chronic Kidney Disease patient Epidermal growth factor receptor ( eGFR ) 60 ml/min/1.73m2 ( stage 3 , 4 5 ) dialysis Patients care physician Chronic Kidney Disease > 2 month expect begin dialysis least 4 month Patients serum phosphate level 5.6 mg/dL 11.0 mg/dL Week 4 ( Visit 1 ) Week 2 ( Visit 2 ) Patients hypocalcemia hypercalcemia ( correct serum calcium level < 7.0 mg/dL > / 11.0 mg/dL ) Week 2 ( Visit 2 ) . Significant renal impairment Had acute renal failure within 3 month Runin period
